text: The 1969–70 Scottish Inter-District Championship was a rugby union competition for Scotland's district teams.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W. Forsyth Princes Street, Edinburgh & Renfield Street, Glasgow. 1969. This season saw the 17th Scottish Inter-District Championship. South won the competition with 2 wins and 1 draw.Forsyth's Rugby Record. pub. R. W.
